content.detailedDescription: I went out side to feed my cats i heard a plane above me i looked up and saw the plane but next to the plane were these 8 shining objects i watched them chang formation a cuople of times and then at the end there were 5 objects in a vea formation then i looked away for a saecond and i looked back up and they were gone
content.summary: 8-5 pearl objects flying in formations

content.detailedDescription:
I am reporting this sighting for the witness who called into mufon dispatch.  lisa behr

witness was out hanging christmas lights when he noticed what at first he thought were geese flying in formation.  there were at least 50 objects flying in a "v" shaped formation and glowing with a slight greenish tint.  he stated that each object seemed to have a mind of its own, yet stayed in formation.  the "v" flew directly over his house at a slow rate of speed and then just disappeard over the horizon.
content.summary: 50 or so lights in "v" formation

content.detailedDescription:
The past couple of nights weve walked our  dog late before bed we see the same object observing us  i believe i had seen again the night we we came home late from shopping she was already inside and i looked up and towards the back lot there was something that was not our own     i know about all the aircraft we have in this world even the ones were not supposed to know about but this was neither     please if some one knows whats going on     tell me what i can do    thank you for your time 
                 scott dunfee
content.summary: Its been observing us    visible late at night       it kept its distance but i believe theyve been surveying now     whats the next step?

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing by a fence photographing a 747-200 owned by evergreen international. after taking one photograph, and glancing at the image to check its quality, i heard some men at a nearby federal express loading dock shout "hey, look at that" i immediately photographed a disk shaped object moving from left to right. the camera caught the disk as it was above the 747, then again as it zipped up and into the sky. this vehicle made no  sound of which i was aware, and there was no aircraft in the area as i also had an aviation band scanner with me. the disk to my eyes appeared to "shimmer" as it flew along, and appeared faceted on the top. i cannot even suggest the velocity of the disk when it left. i was holding the camera stead and the image is streaked. i am unsure how to calculate its velocity at this point. 

the object left my field of vision due to its velocity. there was no sonic boom, or other sound from this disk shaped "thing." 

image one shows the disk over the 747's tail. 

image two shows the disk, in the upper right portion of the photograph as it exited. 

these photographs were 3/4ths of a second apart.
content.summary: Disk hovers then zips away.

content.detailedDescription: We were in our back yard in olivette, missouri and looking ne when we saw an object moving quickly towards us heading sw under the cloud deck.  it was moving extremely fast.  we had observed small commercial jets flying overhead all night and this moved 4 to 5 times more quickly than these jets.  this happened at 9:20 pm.  it had a gray glow which made it appear just slightly lighter than the sky.  it made no sound.
content.summary: Low, extremely fast moving chevron shaped craft.  no sound.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the boardwalk at "the sands"(a beach) in port royal,sc
taking pictures of dolphins and the sunset.
i didn't see nor did i hear anything.
it was only after i downloaded the photos that i noticed the 
strange object at the top of the photo.
though the photo is blurry, when zoomed in the object seems to have what appears to be similar lights on each side(?), however, i leave it to
the experts to decide/figure out what it might be(if anything)
thanks you
content.summary: Strange object in photo

content.detailedDescription:
In late august around the 15th i think, i was setting up my telescope around 5 or 5:30 pm i was looking south just about dusk, waiting for my 3 guide stars to appear when i saw bright object in the southwestern sky, thinking it was the first of my guide stars to appear i watch and looked for the others when i turned back it had it had moved. as it got closer i saw it turn into a red object in the sky with no vapor trail. 

i didn't think much of this because, i am in the flight path of most commercial air traffic. at first i believed the reflection of the setting sun was reflecting off the shell of the normal air traffic. 

a few secs later i saw another one just like the first, so i started to watch them as they passed.Same altitude equal distance apart, same shape, same color, same speed. a few secs later another one came in to view except this one was leaving a vapor trail, so i went and grabbed my camera and took some shots; unfortunately, i can work a telescope but could not figure out how to use the video option of the camera. 

five object passed at the same speed, same distance, same altitude, same shape and color. from the southwestern sky to the southeast and faded out. only the one had the vapor trail. i could not get pictures of them in the same shot because they were just out of sight of the wide angle. i don't remember the zoom i used. i see the air traffic everyday and to me this seemed out of the ordinary for the normal air traffic.
content.summary: Watched 5 objects travel west to east, about   30  sec intervals only one was leaving a trail

content.detailedDescription:
I was coming home from ralph's, i turned left on bellaire from chandler blvd. as i headed toward cumpston, i noticed what i thought might be a glowing balloon n/nw. as i watched the object it began to morph into different tubular shapes. the morphing tube moved rapidly from left to right. i noticed below the tube was a bright glowing disk that remained stationary. if i guessed the altitude, i would say 8k to 10k off the ground. 

this occured in full daylight, near old radio towers. i watched the object for at least five minutes and drove down cumpston to my home to get a camera. when i returned, there was no trace of either the tube or disk.
content.summary: Bright glowing disk with glowing tube like structure morphing ~1000 ft above disk

content.detailedDescription:
It was a clear night and i was outside putting up christmas lights.  i stepped back from the house and looked up to check the lights when i noticed a bright red light in the southern sky.  it was a little lower and to the left of the moon, about 45 degrees above the horizon.  it was about 3 times as large as jupiter and about 3 times as bright.  i watched it for a while expecting to see some navigation lights appear as it approached me.  as it got closer i saw no additional lights and noticed it made no noise. 

i ran inside to get the binoculars so i could get a closer look, as it was flying almost directly overhead.  through the binoculars i saw no discernible shape to the object, just a bright red light quietly going across the sky.  it maintained the same altitude and did not flicker or change direction.  i decided to run inside to get my camera to take some pictures.  i managed to get a few shots, however as i am not that skilled with my camera while taking night shots, i had some trouble getting the auto focus to act right.  the pictures show a red (out of focus) spherical light.  as i watched it travel north off into the distance it then started to blink and went out as if someone had turned off a switch.  i believe it blinked about 5 times prior to it disappearing. 

besides the moon, this was the brightest object in the sky.  i would say the entire event took about seven minutes and when i went inside to write down the specifics i noted the time was 5:47 p. m. central time.  i live about 30 minutes west of st. louis lambert airport so i see airplane traffic all the time, most of which travels west-east.  i hardly ever see any traffic flying south-north (especially this low).  

about 10 minutes after the event i saw a plane coming in for a landing at lambert airport, this object was roughly at the same altitude.  i am not that good at guessing altitudes so i was using this as my guide for an estimate.  my spouse said that my ���incoming plane analogy��� would indicate an altitude for the object of about 7,000 - 10,000 ft.  please note it was not a plane or helicopter.  the body of a commercial plane at that height and directly above can clearly be seen on a cloudless night.  additionally, engine noise and navigation lights for a plane should be easily discernable, none of which were observed.  

again, the red light maintained the same altitude, did not flicker, made no noise and maintained a roughly south to north path.  i have never observed anything remotely like this before.
content.summary: Bright red noiseless light traveled south to north at an altitude of 7,000 -10,000 ft for 7 minutes before blinking then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: After setting up my astronomy equipment and focusing the planetary camera on the upper left  i started started imaging the moon at 10mm zoom. the camera produces the same as a 10 mm eyepiece. using a celestron 8xi telescope with celestron nextimager planetary camera. at 37secs into the footage, an object traveling from the right side of the screen to the left. it seemed to follow the curvature of the moon, but in the scope it would have been horizontally reversed.  i caught only 10 frames of the object and it took only 1 sec to cross the screen. i tried enhancing the image to see more of what the object was, but the best i could get was to see moon surface detail underneath the object which lead me to believe that this is a shadow of an object. the closes thing i could figure to the object identy was the luner recon probe, but could not confirm nor deny this.
content.summary: While inmaging the moon, an object crossed my field of view at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription: i was standing outside on the balcony at my daughters apartment building. when i looked up at the moon. then i looked underneath the moon and noticed a circular shape with lights around the underside of the object they did not appear to be flashing and the object was stationary in the sky.It was not any commercial aircraft and it was not any military aircraft. living in wichita,kansas you see airplanes all the time flying day and night.  i watched object for 10-12 minutes before the clouds covered object. as i said earlier object was round underneath with lights around bottom outside edge. when i saw object i thought to my self what in the heck is that. i have never seen anything like that before. my husband always points out commercial and military aircraft to me all the time telling me exactly what it is.Even at night i can tell the difference between man made aircraft from something of unknown origin.
content.summary: Circular shape in the night sky south southwest 45deg. aproxitmaly 8000 ft.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my neighbor watched a star like object move across the sky .From the distance it must have been traveling faster than anything we have.
content.summary: A star looking object traveled across the sky from north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
I at the moment was inside with friends and my mother when one of my friends told us to come outside. my friend was telling us to look up at the sky and that's when we saw the two objects. he wanted us to see what he saw because he wanted witness not just himself. i kept looking at the two objects making sure it was what he told me because my friend had experienced seeing these objects various times.
   the two objects had bright lights they were moving in place but u could notice that they were nothing similiar to any airplane or helicopter. if u looked at it u could see it had a red circleing light and it spun. when i noticed it was an ufo event i was surprised that i actually got to experience this but i wanted to see more because the two objects disapeared like if they were never there.
content.summary: The two  object had a  bright light they were circular shaped and it moved in place.

content.detailedDescription: A buddy and i were standing in my driveway in lake charles, la. i was star gazing as i normally do. i saw a satellite moving across the sky moving from the north to the south and told my buddy hey look its a satellite. as it passed jupiter on the left, heading north the dot grew to the size of a golf ball brighter than jupiter but in a dull orange color, then dimmed to a dot, a few seconds later it grew but only half the size as before, this time as it dimmed it looked as if it split into four different object and all went in compass direction, n,s,e,w only this time they never brightened again. at first, i thought it was a reentry or something skipping off the atmosphere, but that doesn't happen like that, and it was to slow for a meteor. i am an amateur astronomer and have never seen anything like that.
content.summary: Satilite looking object was moving across the sky it passed jupiter then brightened to the size of a golf ball twice.

content.detailedDescription:
This report is being filed by a mufon investigator for the witness with his approval to get the information in to the cms data base.

briefly, the witness and his wife were sitting outside between 6:30 and 7:00 pm just prior to halloween he believes.  he lives on long island and was in the military and easily recognizes commercial airlines and airborne objects of all kinds.  they spotted an orange pulsing object 10 to 15 miles away up in the sky and watched a commercial plane pass it.  the witnesses then watched as this jet did "a 360 and turned back towards the airport".  the orange object disappeared.  twenty minutes later he spotted it again over near the sound (water) but still as high in the air as the plane had been prior.  the airport is 25 miles away, there are no military bases nearby where he feels the government could be testing new crafts.  this second sighting was the same orange pulsing object.  it moved south to north finally getting smaller and smaller until it was gone.  if his arm was held out in front of him and hand open, he could cover up the object.  that is all he could think of to tell over the phone at this time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Orange pill box shaped object.

content.detailedDescription:
I was headed westbound on hwy 80 as i've done many times before,taking a load to san francisco.It was about 0200-0230 as i was approaching the tunnel,it's located about half way thru nev.,when i started to feel really strange.I remember entering the tunnel and then nothing....... the next thing i knew i was in mccaren 76 truck stop,comming up off the steering wheel,feeling completley disoriented,and wondering what had just happened.What astounded me evev more is that i when looked at my "el-cheapo" truck stop timex i noticed it had stopped,it's battery opperated!And was working before!!.I somehow had arrived at the truck stop approx. 4 hours earlier than expected,and by all means the truck i was driving could only run a max speed of 68 mph 
this happened about july of '78.
since then i have had several encounters with "outworlders" 
or their spacecraft.
                                    sincerely
                                    edward choda
content.summary: Abducted while driving a big truck,18 wheeler.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling north on noland road in independence when i saw a flying object near noland road and 23rd street flying in a southwest direction. it was a silvery white shiny color with a dark color nose and flying at a 45 degree angle down, but with the nose even with the craft, not nose-down.  no wings or tail. it was an oval or cigar shape. there was no sound. the size was small but i could not tell the size - i am sure however that this was much smaller than a single engine small aircraft, more the size of a large model plane.  there are no model airfields near this location.  i would be surprised if no one else saw this.
content.summary: Cigar shaped drone over independence, mo

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 8:00 pm mountain standard time i and 5 other adults witnessed a ufo in the  south-west night sky over chandler az.   we were sitting in our back yard smoking a cigarette and chatting when i first saw this object that caught my eye.  the lights were very bright green and red in color and they did not blink.  it shot straight up in the sky at first.  i didn't know what it was, it made no sound and didn't move like any normal aircraft would.  the object  appeared to be  5 to six times bigger than a star would be in the night sky.  in guessing distance i would say it was about 500/1000 ft above the ground, hard to tell distance.   it also appeared to have red and green lights that did not flash they stayed lit and changed color���from green to red and sometimes both green and red.   it  didn���t maneuver like a typical aircraft would.  it moved in a more circular pattern sometimes and could change elevation and direction very quickly.  as it maneuvered across the sky the lights changed color. they were very bright lights and it banked at speeds a normal aircraft cannot bank at.  we continued to watch it in the night sky, videoing taping until it descended  below the horizon. we were all in awe, amazed and curious as to what it was and excited that we were able to film it and watch the tape over and over again.
attached is the actual footage that was taken!
content.summary: Green and red steady lights maneuvering over the southwest night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i will never look at the sky the same. i was sitting on my deck facing southeast when a briteness caught my attention. there it was half as big as the full moon that nite orangish fireball with orange/purple tail.
tall wasnt very long. object was silent although when i descibe it i wana make a wishing noise. i would at first think asteroid or shooting star but it seemed so close that i would think it would crash to earth if so. i thought it was going to crash as it traveled northeast it seemed to be dropping in altitude. so i jumped up and ran to edge of my deck to see the impact but object just went over horison.It lit the sky up as if it was magnezium burning.It seemed to be moving slower then any kind of meteor or asteroid would who knows.I just know i never seen anything like it some of the other reports seem to be the same object. it never stopped moving while i watched and traveled the whole lenth of sky.As it passed over the mountains in northeast it lit them up not like it shined a lite on them but the same light that caught my attention.Wow just cant get it out of my head.Thanks maybe soon we will know.
content.summary: Fire ball over prescott

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling south on stinson lake rd. towards rte. 25, i had just crossed over the bridge that crossed the baker river, traveling at about 25 mph, the sky was dark, except for the sliver of the moon that night, which was directly in front of me, i noticed, to the west a light traveling towards the east (my left to the right). it was much larger than a planet, star, or satellite. it was about the size of my thumbnail at arms length. the light was bright and non-diffuse. at first i thought it must be a plane or other craft, but it was too low. it was descending at about a 20 degree angle. i could just make out the horizon of the nearby mountains. the light was just above that line. the, before it reached that line it simply blinked out. i saw no trail/tail to the light. i could hear no sound, but i was int he vehicle, so it is unlikely i would have heard much anyway. based on its angle of descent it seemed to be landing. there is no landing area in that direction. the airport is miles in the opposite direction.

after it disappeared i drove on a bit more, and pulled into the drive of the stinson mountain grill, and parked. i got out and looked about the sky for a few minutes. i saw nothing else. i wen in the restaurant and asked if other had seen anything unusual, and none had.

it may well have a mundane explanation, but what i saw was not easily classified.
content.summary: Bright descending light spotted over rumney, nh suddenly dissapears

content.detailedDescription:
File 1: taken @ 18:51 on 20/02.2009

file 2: taken @ 00:17 on 18/06/2009

file 3: taken @ 21:59 on 25/10/2009

photograph's taken with nikon d60 camera.
content.summary: Are these dust particles ???

content.detailedDescription:
In 2008 between may - september 2008, almost every night i would hear a helicopter above caversham/reading.
prior to this video i had taken a photo of one of the helicopters & was shocked by what i saw.
on the night i recorded this video on my camera phone i heard one & saw
only one set of lights.
please rotate footage once to the right.  the two orange lights are street
lamps.
i have been unable to edit or cut this footage & i would say only the first half is of relevance.

file 2: date taken: 27th may 2008   time: 1.38 am
file 2: is of a photo again of one of the helicopters it was taken from inside my living room & it was literally hovering above my garden. 
my nieghbour was with me & we turned the light off so to observe what
this was.
as in the video & photo i call them helicopters because they sounded like helicopters sometimes broken helicopters but i/we were unable to see any 
outline of what i/we could hear, except for in the photo i mentioned first.
content.summary: Helicopters ?  - although we could not see the out-line.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
Ok i reported the other day seeing strange orbs in cabo's skiesbut to do i was cleaning the car and i noticed the same lights as that are allways coming back but to my suprise there seem to be alot more bright ones than usually so i got my camera and started take shots in the sky to see what they were it dawned upon me that the orbs look to be part of a bigger craft cloaking itself to appear invisible but i could see them slightly rotating in a fixed position the photos agree with what i was thinking as i took numbers a pics in defferent places in the sky,and everytime until the cloud cover blocked my view the objects were there.
    there were a few other things that caught my eye while looking at these pics as there seemed to be something scared out from in the palm tree as i took the shot,whem i took the photos my camera was set on long shutter 15secs and i would set it down on something so it wouldn't move at all not even when i touch the button as i also put timer on it took three pics at a time. so look at the palm tree on the left and when you put the sequence together you will see something don't now what, the first thing i notice was a leave move on the top and the rest didn't, the next was in the second of three pics you see faintly a round object and back towards the tree is it leaving from under one of the upper leaves and i notices the leaf looked pushed back but not like it would have been done by wind. so it's a bit worrying to see but i just want to now if there has been any sittings like this anywhere or other pics around or video fotage will have more photos on youtube soon,
content.summary: Large strange triangles in the sky
content.locationName: Cabo San Lucas, Baja California Sur

content.detailedDescription: On 7/4/2004 at approximately 10pm, my son(13) and i(33) were laying a trampoline at a friends house in the back yard looking at the night sky.  i told him if he looked close he could see satelites as they passed by circling the globe.  we saw two and he was very fascinated.  we then began to locate constelations, the big dipper, the little dipper and so on.  when we looked to the west i noticed what seemed to be a bright star.  i asked my son if he seen it and he replied yes.  then the star moved, i then thought maybe it was a helicopter or plane.  i realized that it didn't have any strobes and it moved from side to side in a zig zag type pattern.  i approximate it was maybe a mile away.  i asked my son, do you see that?  he replied, yes.  i then asked him, what is it doing?  he replied, zig zagging!  i wanted to make sure that i, was not seeing things!  since it was at a distance we could not hear any type of engine noise.  we could not make out a shape at this time, just points of very bright light.  the movement of this vehicle was very precise, it seems to be scanning the area.  to describe it, it seemed like it was suspened from a string because it never changed elevation.  the movement reminded me of a computer printer, sharp precise side to side irratic motion.  within seconds it was approximately 100-200 yards away, and now we could see that the points of light formed a triangle or diamond type shape.  that is when it basically stopped in mid air!!!  there still was not a sound, complete silience and now it was moving toward us very slowly unlike anything i have ever witnessed.  this object was not flying, i am not an expert on flying, but i do know planes and helicopters must maintain a certain air speed to maintain lift.  planes bank when they turn and make a distinct noise.  helicopters can hover and make tons of noise.  this was not a hover, just a complete stop.  then it seemed as if the vehicle could see us and it began to head towards us.  at that point i admit, i was scared, i grabbed my son by his shirt and pulled him off the trampoline heading to the front of the house where everone else was located.  the whole time i kept a visual on the object and it then turned sharp towards the north and in a second or two it was gone.  once in the front of the house we asked had anyone else seen what we had.  everyone looked at us like we were crazy. both my son and i were very excited and scared at the same time. if i had to guess the size of the object was approximately 30-60ft in diameter with points of light on the either three to four corners.  to this day i ask my son about that night and he remembers it like it just happened.  to say the least it has made and impact on both of us.  we both concluded that it was definitely a u.F.O. not a plane, helicopter, blimp, hot air balloon, firework, flare, lantern, etc.  i wish i had not become frightened so i could have observed it longer, but my instinct to protect my son kiked in because i honestly did not know what we were witnessing.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Do you see what i see?

content.detailedDescription:
I sent this picture in to you guys before, unedited. i don't have the number of the file i was given. but here is the magnified version. this is the best i could do with the photo enhancement program i have. if you still have the origional, maybe you can do better. i used the telephoto feature. it was a long distance away. it also was cloaked by a cloud. i used the contrast to show the shape of the object. now that i know how bright these suckers are, i can spot them. they move pretty fast. i'm lucky to get a snapshot. 
everyone i showed the photo to, just couldn't see what i saw, so i cropped it down.
content.summary: Picture taken from the truck at 60 mph.

content.detailedDescription: Tonight while walking the dog, i happen to look up and seen a fireball with a tale behind it. it was orange/red, and it appeared very low in the sky it was so low that it disappeared behind the tree line. it didn't appear to be a shooting star. at the same time my husband was looking in another direction and was saying did you see that, a flash of light in the sky .
content.summary: Ball of fire

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from work on 495 south bound at about 5:15pm.
i noticed an odd looking flying object in the shape of a triangle. the object had three (3) dim white lights on the three sides. it seemed to be close, but fading into the clouds, it leads me to believe that it had to have been very high up and large.
content.summary: Rt 495 sighting of triangular flying object

content.detailedDescription: Just happen "unbelievable"
content.summary: Numerous dim lighted objects  in a v/ formation ,flying south over clarion pa.Unbeleivablee

content.detailedDescription:
We were north of champion michigan (zip 49814) from approx nov 10 to nov 20, and in the early sky to the se and left of orions belt what appeared to be the constellation pleiades (not sure) but left of orions belt for sure, and low in the night sky after dark. the backwards shaped 7 (might have been pleiades) seemed to blink down from top to bottom, when looking through a pair of good binoculars, there was 4 faint stars above it, that would flash and the entire inside shape of the diamond would fill in as if it were all lit up and filled in. as the night sky continued, the object rotated up with the rest of the stars and constellations until around 11 - 12 pm, it would be very high in the sky. we were looking east south east at the time of the initial viewing on the 10th or so. it was there every night, except on the cloudy nights. the cabin is very remote, and there is little if any light pollution so the stars are very visible to the naked eye. 

this object had no regular pattern to its appearance (the diamond), and didnt appear at specific intervals, only random. it appeared to be a diamond above the backwards 7 (maybe pleiades). we looked at it for over an hour total on several different occasions. we have been going there for over 20 years, and never seen this "diamond shaped object" appear ever before.

what is it, and what did we see?

sorry, we have no pictures or video of it.
content.summary: Diamond shaped flashing light above pleiades (near) orions belt

content.detailedDescription:
I have very high bedroom windows.  while on the phone, i looked up at the patch of sky that is visible above my neighbor's two story house.  out from behind their roof suddenly drifted something with three large, red, steady lights with a white strobe flashing. the apparent size would be length of your thumb held at arm's length. the separation and size of the red lights was like if you positioned three pennies in a triangular pattern with  maybe a half-dollar in between them.  they were a steady red, not real bright.  there was a fairly powerful white strobe located inboard of the three red lights but much closer to the top light in the triangle.  the strobe was flashing for approximately 1/30 of a second in approximately one second intervals. if it was a helicopter, using a typical helicopter as a yardstick, it would have been no more than 100 ft. from me and drifting at no more than 100 ft altitude.  there was absolutely no sound.  at that hypothetical distance the three red lights would have been more than 18" in  diameter. again, at the hypothetical distance of 100 ft the craft would have been going 25 mph or less, which seems like it would be below the stall speed of any fixed-wing craft.

although it seemed like a helicopter going by that close would have made a lot of noise, i went ahead and checked the federal aviation administration (faa) website to see what the regulations are for collision avoidance lights for helicopters.


here is an excerpt from the faa regulations for rotorcraft (helicopters)

"(c) flashing characteristics. the arrangement of the system, that is, the number of light sources, beam width, speed of rotation, and other characteristics, must give an effective flash frequency of not less than 40, nor more than 100, cycles per minute. the effective flash frequency is the frequency at which the rotorcraft's complete anticollision light system is observed from a distance, and applies to each sector of light including any overlaps that exist when the system consists of more than one light source. in overlaps, flash frequencies may exceed 100, but not 180, cycles per minute.
(d) color. each anticollision light must be aviation red and must meet the applicable requirements of ���27.1397."  

so the lights have to be red but they must be flashing lights.
the lights outside my bedroom window were not flashing at all but a steady red. they were also larger than any running lights i have ever seen on any aircraft.
content.summary: Three large red lights with a flashing white strobe inside, very low altitude drifting 25 mph or less.
